data.title: Kevin Smith Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Kevin Smith on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Kevin Smith including Live Free or Die Hard, Scream 3, and more.
data.text:
The D & D Vortex

When the gang finds out that Wil Wheaton hosts a celebrity Dungeons & Dragons game involving WILLIAM SHATNER, JOE MANGANIELLO, NBA legend KAREEM ABDUL-JABBAR and director KEVIN SMITH, deception and betrayal are the path to make it to the one open seat.

Hollywood

The guys fly to LA to try directing, then meet up with Jay and Silent Bob to "pants" the town red.

Driver Ed

After tragedy strikes Neptune, Calif. and the local sheriff rushes to judgment, an emotional Veronica attempts to help a grieving family member rule out suicide as a contributing cause in the calamity. Meanwhile, Wallace offers to help transfer student Jackie Cook, the fiery, flirty daughter of professional baseball player Terrence Cook, track down the person who damaged her car in the school lot. Later, mayoral candidate Woody Goodman asks Keith to consider running for sheriff.

Goin' Down the Road, Pt. 2

Off his meds and out of control, Craig disappears into the streets. It's up to Joey to save him, but Joey's got enough to do to save his relationship with Caitlin, who's been spending an awful lot of time with Kevin Smith.

West End Girls

Paige hates Manny. Manny hates Paige. So on the biggest night of the year, it's probably not a good thing that they're wearing the same prom dress. Things are gonna turn ugly, and Kevin Smith gets to be there to see it all.
